contacts S4 class and methods

Source: R/contacts.R
contacts.Rd

contacts S4 class and methods

contacts(
  file,
  resolution = NULL,
  focus = NULL,
  metadata = list(),
  topologicalFeatures = S4Vectors::SimpleList(loops =
    S4Vectors::Pairs(GenomicRanges::GRanges(), GenomicRanges::GRanges()), borders =
    GenomicRanges::GRanges(), compartments = GenomicRanges::GRanges(), viewpoints =
    GenomicRanges::GRanges()),
  pairsFile = NULL
)

# S4 method for contacts
length(x)

# S4 method for contacts,numeric,ANY,ANY
[(x, i)

# S4 method for contacts
fileName(object)

# S4 method for contacts
seqinfo(x)

resolutions(x)

# S4 method for contacts
resolution(x)

bins(x)

focus(x)

# S4 method for contacts
interactions(x)

# S4 method for contacts,GInteractions
interactions(x) <- value

scores(x, name)

scores(x, name) <- value

topologicalFeatures(x, name)

topologicalFeatures(x, name) <- value

pairsFile(x, name)

pairsFile(x) <- value

metadata(x) <- value

# S4 method for contacts
anchors(x)

# S4 method for contacts
regions(x)

# S4 method for contacts
summary(object)

# S4 method for contacts
show(object)

Arguments

file

Path to a (m)cool file

resolution

Resolution to use with mcool file

focus

focus Chr. coordinates for which interaction counts are extracted from the .(m)cool file, provided as a character string (e.g. "II:4000-5000"). If not provided, the entire (m)cool file will be imported.

metadata

list of metadata

topologicalFeatures

topologicalFeatures provided as a named SimpleList

pairsFile

Path to an associated .pairs file

x

A contacts object.

i

a range or boolean vector.

object

A contacts object.

value

value

name

name

Value

a new contacts object.

Slots

fileName

Path of (m)cool file

focus

Chr. coordinates for which interaction counts are extracted from the .(m)cool file.

resolutions

Resolutions available in the .(m)cool file.

resolution

Current resolution

interactions

Genomic Interactions extracted from the .(m)cool object

scores

Available interaction scores.

topologicalFeatures

Topological features associated with the dataset (e.g. loops (\<Pairs\>), borders (\<GRanges\>), viewpoints (\<GRanges\>), etc...)

pairsFile

Path to the .pairs file associated with the .(m)cool file

metadata

metadata associated with the .(m)cool file.

Examples

library(HiContacts)
contacts_yeast <- contacts_yeast()
#> snapshotDate(): 2022-08-23
#> see ?HiContactsData and browseVignettes('HiContactsData') for documentation
#> loading from cache
contacts_yeast
#> `contacts` object with 74,360 interactions over 802 regions 
#> -------
#> fileName: "/github/home/.cache/R/ExperimentHub/3667eb5d688_7752" 
#> focus: "II" 
#> resolutions(5): 1000 2000 4000 8000 16000
#> current resolution: 1000 
#> interactions: 74360 
#> scores(2): raw balanced 
#> topologicalFeatures: loops(0) borders(0) compartments(0) viewpoints(0) 
#> pairsFile: N/A 
#> metadata(0):
length(contacts_yeast)
#> [1] 74360
contacts_yeast[seq_len(10)]
#> `contacts` object with 10 interactions over 802 regions 
#> -------
#> fileName: "/github/home/.cache/R/ExperimentHub/3667eb5d688_7752" 
#> focus: "II" 
#> resolutions(5): 1000 2000 4000 8000 16000
#> current resolution: 1000 
#> interactions: 10 
#> scores(2): raw balanced 
#> topologicalFeatures: loops(0) borders(0) compartments(0) viewpoints(0) 
#> pairsFile: N/A 
#> metadata(0):

#> [1] "/github/home/.cache/R/ExperimentHub/3667eb5d688_7752"

#> List of length 2
#> names(2): raw balanced

#> [1] 14  8  1  1  7  2

#> [1]        NaN 0.04720230        NaN        NaN        NaN 0.04113549
scores(contacts_yeast, 'test') <- runif(length(contacts_yeast))
tail(scores(contacts_yeast, 'test'))
#> [1] 0.4340942 0.0366653 0.7579076 0.1420236 0.2873017 0.4189317
full_contacts_yeast <- full_contacts_yeast()
#> snapshotDate(): 2022-08-23
#> see ?HiContactsData and browseVignettes('HiContactsData') for documentation
